title: 额我想问一下PUTTY怎么开不到服
author: za1425
txt_content:
本帖最后由 za1425 于 2013-8-20 10:04 编辑 

那里老是显示
Cannot start server: The server is already running.
Stopping and holding the server...
Forcing a save... (Shutdown delayed)
Cannot start server: The server is already running.
Stopping and holding the server...
Stopping and holding the server...
Cannot start server: The server is already running.
Stopping and holding the server...
Stopping and holding the server...
Cannot start server: The server is already running.
但是服务器没开啊，求解决方法

replies.author: 无聊0013
replies.txt_content: 服务器没开，当然进不去啦
